actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1968 to provide for criteria for the provision of air navigation and traffic control facilities and services.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to establish criteria based on the volume of air traffic to be used in determining the air navigation facilities and personnel authorized to be provided to an airport under such Act. Requires the Administrator, in prescribing rules under this Act, to submit such a proposed rule to the Congress. Sets forth the rules by which the Congress shall act on such a proposed rule.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1968 to provide for criteria for the provision of air navigation and traffic control facilities and services.
